name: Megalomania
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 42

A simple platformer, but your character keeps growing. you must get out of the cave before you get stuck an are crushed. 

Credits:

Music: Cave Music by Gigawowski

https://opengameart.org/content/cave-music-0
